20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: Al Sa’b bin Jaththamah reported the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) as saying “There is no (permission for) protected land except for Allaah and His Prophet. Ibn Shihab said “It has reached me that the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) protected Naqi’.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الأَرْضِ يَحْمِيهَا الإِمَامُ أَوِ الرَّجُلُ
chapter.eng-name: Land Protected By A Ruler Or By A Man
